panel

pagination medium

PREVIEW

처음 이전 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 120 다음 끝

CODE

<!-- pagination -->
<div class="pagination medium">
	<a class="btn first" href="#">처음</a>
	<a class="btn prev" href="#">이전</a>
	<a href="#">1</a>
	<a href="#">2</a>
	<strong title="현재위치">3</strong>
	<a href="#">4</a>
	<a href="#">5</a>
	<a href="#">6</a>
	<a href="#">7</a>
	<a href="#">8</a>
	<a href="#">9</a>
	<a href="#">120</a>
	<a class="btn next" href="#">다음</a>
	<a class="btn last" href="#">끝</a>
</div>
<!-- //pagination -->

direction medium

PREVIEW

CODE

<!-- direction -->
<div class="direction medium">
	<button type="button" class="btn prev">다음</button>
	<button type="button" class="btn next">이전</button>
</div>
<!-- //direction -->
